textAfterTable: Note: Children age 5 and under receive a free ticket with a paid adult ticket. Child must be present at time of purchase. Powder Ridge Ski Area lift ticket prices are provided to OnTheSnow.com directly by the mountain resorts and those resorts are responsible for their accuracy. Lift ticket prices are subject to change.
